title: Home
brief_description: Home may not be palatial but it’s where you want to be; the story of a seventy year old woman’s search for a space of her own. Cast includes Queenie Ashton, Sue Brooks, Jill Clayton and others. Director of photographer: Laurie Kirkwood; Production Manager: Sue Richter; 1st Assistant: Jane Campion; Production Assistant: Anna Grieve.
